name: Pinterest Verify Meta Tag
author: Marvie Pons

sections.description:
Pinterest Verify Meta Tag is a simple plugin which simply insert Pinterest meta tag verification code to the HEAD section of your site.

Once you completed the verification process, people will see a checkmark next to your domain in your Pinterest profile and in pinner search results. That check mark emphasis you have confirmed the ownership of your blog or website on Pinterest.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

OR

Just grab Pinterest Verify Meta Tag from the built in plugin directory and choose “Install now”, hit ok, then select the “Activate Plugin” link.
sections.faq:
Can’t find the meta tag in the source code?

Clear your cache if you are using any cache plugin.
